body_html:
Ah the reason I asked is that I'm facing two issues.

  • the pip installed version of tensorflow relies on cuda7.5 and cudnn4.
  • however, configuring tensorflow with 7.5 and cudnn4 before compiling tensorflow serving fails. It succeeds however with cuda7.0 and cudnn4.

I was wondering if there exists a version of that file as referenced in the tutorial that may solve the problem.

body:
Ah the reason I asked is that I'm facing two issues. 
- the pip installed version of tensorflow relies on cuda7.5 and cudnn4.
- however, configuring tensorflow with 7.5 and cudnn4 before compiling tensorflow serving fails. It succeeds however with cuda7.0 and cudnn4.

I was wondering if there exists a version of that file as referenced in the tutorial that may solve the problem.
